inclusion.criterion: Twenty for hours ambulatory blood pressure monitor (ABPM)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Use of any drug that may affect nitric oxide synthesis and/or blood pressure values
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Renal failure defined as estimated glomerular filtration rate (eGFR) less than 60 ml/min
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: A previous diagnosis of ischemic heart disease, Transient ischemic attack (TIA), Stroke or peripheral arterial disease
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has been admitted to the hospital after 10 days of cough and fever. He has a positive sputum culture for Mycobacterium tuberculosis.
